General.Name: M3 Technology Inc.
General.Description: M3 Technology Inc. engages in testing, designing, production, and marketing analog and mixed-signal integrated circuits (ICs) in Taiwan. It focuses on high-end power management ICs and provides power management IC chips for computers, communication, and consumer electronics. The company also offers buck, boost, and buck-boost converters, LDO, load switches, and charger ICs. M3 Technology Inc. was founded in 2010 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.
